DOC.brief_summary: This research programme purport test effectiveness two Transcranial Magnetic Stimulation ( TMS ) protocol ( Repetitive high frequency protocol Theta Burst protocol ) reduce symptoms depression . The study also use Magnetic Resonance Imaging ( MRI ) scan improve localization TMS target .
DOC.brief_title: TMS Treatment Depression National Health Service
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis depressive disorder ( DSMIV ) Diagnosis treatment resistance ( least stage 1 define Thase & Rush , 1997 depression ) Female male 18 70 year History Bipolar disorder Clinically relevant neurological comorbidity brain neoplasm , cerebral vascular event , epilepsy , neurodegenerative disorder , prior brain surgery Metal object around body remove Pregnancy Cardiac pacemaker implant medication pump Major unstable medical illness Change prescribe medication 2 week precede start TMS trial Current alcohol/stimulant dependence propensity toxic/withdrawal seizure
